word: [ if all this is so, then the ] Lord
str2: Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: To rescue, deliver (from danger or destruction).
Pious, God-fearing, devout. From eu and sebomai; well-reverent, i.e. Pious.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
From peirazo; a putting to proof (of good), experience (of evil), solicitation, discipline or provocation); by implication, adversity.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
From teros; to guard, i.e. To note; by implication, to detain; by extension, to withhold; by extension, to withhold.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: To chastise, curtail, punish; mid: I cause to be punished. From kolos; properly, to curtail, i.e. to chastise.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
Decision; by extension, a tribunal; by implication, justice.
